ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron relaxed in Dinobot s arms, her internal reapairs hummed and clicked as they fixed the worst of her damage. When they reached the cave Tavatron

Tavatron relaxed in Dinobot's arms, her internal reapairs hummed and clicked 
as they fixed the worst of her damage. When they reached the cave Tavatron 
slightly opened her eyes:

"I don't suppose you have anything to eat? I'm starving." Tavatron's stomach 
growled.

(OOC: Thanx for the lift!)

>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Tue, 18 Apr 2000 18:12:29 PDT
>
>* Dinobot looked around as he heard someone's jet-packs activate then fad
>away, he was in no mood or condition to battle now anyway.
>He sighed as he looked back down at Tavatron, she was tired already?
>Since his scanners had located a cave only a short distance away he decided
>that NOW was the perfect time to go there, mainly before Tavatron started
>snoring!
>Dinobot knew that she was damaged and very tired so he decided to show
>manners and picked her up in his arms to save her the energy she would 
>spend
>in walking.
>She was a little heavier then he had expected! ( No offence, of coarse.)
>No matter, he wouldn't be in the Beast Wars at all if he had ever let a
>little weight bring him down.Besides, his own damage was making his
>abilities weaken.
>Dinobot then began to walk off in the direction of the cliff-side cave, he
>scanned it as he walked and saw that it was more then big enough to house
>two transformers.
>Dinobot suddenly heard his stomach gurgle and knew that he was hungry, he
>decided that as soon as he got Tavatron steeled he would go out and catch
>breakfast.*
>
>( Carnage_Blood: Please don't mind me moving Tavatron like this, she's 
>tired
>and Dinobot decided to do the work of walking for her.)
>
